original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naajjhattārammaṇo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham bahiddha ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na bahiddha ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā a nidassana appaṭigha

original: bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo
analyzed: bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham bahiddha ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca
na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe
